descriptionHtml:
I miss Morrowind\'s Unarmored-and Unarmed-Skill so much. So, I made my own, and perks are like warrior monks in real life have

Unarmored is under Light Armory-skill tree, but you don\'t need increase Light Armor to open Unamored perks. You need just level up, and open some Unarmored perks to get new ones

Unarmed perks are under One hended-skilltree, and to get perks, You need just level up, and open some Unarmored perks to get new ones

[b]Unarmored perks:[/b]

[b]Hard Skin:[/b] 1 take 5% lesser damage when unarmored
		2 take 10% lesser damage when unarmored
		3 take 15% lesser damage when unarmored
		4 take 20% lesser damage when unarmored
		5 take 25% lesser damage when unarmored

[b]Rabbit Sprint:[/b]  increase running speed 10% if not wearing armor
[b]Cat Falling:[/b]	Half damage from falling if not wearing armor
[b]Focused Rest:[/b]	Stamina regenerates 50% faster when unarmored
[b]Iron Clothes:[/b]	10% Armor bonus if wearing all clothes: head, chest, hands, feet
[b]Quik Senses:[/b]	10% chance of avoiding all damage from a melee attack when unarmored

[b]Unarmed perks:[/b]

[b]Deadly Fists:[/b]	1 unarmed attacks do 5 more damage
		2 unarmed attacks do 10 more damage
		3 unarmed attacks do 15 more damage
		4 unarmed attacks do 20 more damage
		5 unarmed attacks do 25 more damage

[b]Tought Stamina:[/b] Unarmed attacks take 25% lesser stamina
[b]Savage Strike:[/b]	Can do a power attack while sprinting that does double critical damage
[b]Striking palm:[/b]  Poweattack have 25% chance to paralyze the target

[b]1.2v fix:[/b] Now you need just level up to open perks, as long as I tested it. This contain Deadly Fists-perk fix too.
I changed Deadly Fist Perk damage percents to increased base damage, cause it effected to all damage what you make with eapons and fists. Now every Deadly Fist perk increase your base damage of unarmored damage by 5.

[b]Unarmored perksfix 1.3:[/b]
Now you need just level up to open perks, as long as I tested it. Now there is not perk opening bug anymore.

[b]Install/Unistall:[/b] just put datafiles into Skyrim/Data, and Â´check from Skyrim Launcer, that you use it.

You can allways add comment, if you want me to add something to this mod
You can use this for your own modding if you want, just put thanks for me
